m_szDocTitle: Six high-concept cars which will change the face of automobiles - The Economic Times
m_szDocSumamry: Six high-concept cars which will change the face of automobiles Business Insider| 30 Dec, 2015, 03.22PM IST They may exist only on paper for now, but these cars offer a radical view of driving in the years to come.(Representative Image) They may exist only on paper for now, but these six high-concept cars offer a radical view of driving in the years to come. 1. Toyota's hydrogen fuelled concept car What it is: The vehicle can generate electricity from hydrogen that's stored in its tank, as well as from hydrogen stored outside the vehicle.
